The structural models presented here are built upon a vast number of STM data obtained on (1 1 0)
silicon and germaniumsurfaces and their vicinals published in the literature [see, for example [
The work is performed using ﬁrst-principles calculations. The calculations were carried out using
(a) THTR stepped model of the Si(110)-(16
2) surface (positive buckled conﬁguration). The atoms of the ﬁrst, second and
third layers are marked in blue, green and white, respectively. The black circles indicate the positions P1
in STM images are expected according to T. Yamasaki et al. [
(e) Calculated constant-current STM images using the THTR
1.0 V. (b), (d) Positive buckled conﬁguration. (c), (e) Averaged STMimage using positive and negative buckled
surface conﬁgurations. The unit cell is outlined in (a), (b) and (c). The image size in (d), (e) is 150
